## 添加或修改人物台词

语言: 简体中文(CN)

### WILSON

```lua
return { 
     ANNOUNCE_EAT = { 
         MOD_DO_NOT_EAT_TOO_MUCH_FULL = "我已经吃饱了。", 
         MOD_DO_NOT_EAT_TOO_MUCH_OVERFLOW = "我吃不了那么多东西。", 
         MOD_DO_NOT_EAT_TOO_MUCH_DANGER = "我不能继续吃了。" 
     } 
 }
```
